long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly transform your new tab page into a custom navigation board which you can quickly add favorite sites and open tabs.

Key Features:
- Personalized Navigation: Easily add and manage your favorite websites for quick access.
- Quick Tab Addition: Instantly add currently open tabs to your custom new tab page.
- User-friendly Interface: Intuitive design for a seamless user experience.
- Organize Your Favorites: Group and categorize your favorite sites for easy navigation.

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us through comments or email.
